txt_en: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
txt_cn: 拥有的多并不算富有，给予的多才算富有。
author: Erich Fromm

txt_en: Life is not merely being alive, but being well.
txt_cn: 生活不只是活着，而是精彩地活着。
author: Marcus Valerius Martialis

txt_en: It always seems impossible until it's done.
txt_cn: 事情未成功之前，总看似不可能完成。
author: Nelson Mandela

txt_en: I truly believe there's always a solution to every problem.
txt_cn: 我确信，每个问题都有解决方案。
author: Maira Kalman

txt_en: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
txt_cn: 掌握命运的是我们自己，而不是天上的星星。
author: William Shakespeare

txt_en: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
txt_cn: 我从未梦想成功，我只向着成功努力。
author: Estée Lauder

txt_en: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
txt_cn: 能改变生活的只有我自己，没有人能替我改变。
author: Carol Burnett

txt_en: Nothing is more highly to be prized than the value of each day.
txt_cn: 把握当下才是真。
author: Johann Wolfgangvon Goethe

txt_en: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the face.
txt_cn: 永远不要垂下头。要高昂着头，直面这世界。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
txt_cn: 知生命之意者，可承生命之重。
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

txt_en: The memories we make with our family are everything.
txt_cn: 我们和家人一起创造的记忆最为重要。
author: Candace Cameron Bure

txt_en: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
txt_cn: 我并非由环境造就，乃是由我所做出的决定造就。
author: Stephen Covey

txt_en: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.
txt_cn: 愚者追求远方的快乐，智者播种脚下的幸福。
author: James Oppenheim

txt_en: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
txt_cn: 行动不一定能带来快乐，但不行动一定不能。
author: Benjamin Disraeli

txt_en: Nothing is so common as the wish to be remarkable.
txt_cn: 没有什么比希望不平凡而更平凡的了。
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

txt_en: People are lonely because they build walls instead of bridges.
txt_cn: 人们感到孤独，是因为他们为自己修起了围墙而不是桥梁。
author: Joseph Fort Newton

txt_en: One should eat to live, not live to eat.
txt_cn: 人生应为生而食，不应为食而生。
author: Moliere

txt_en: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
txt_cn: 真正的智慧是知道自己一无所知。
author: Socrates

txt_en: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
txt_cn: 只有付诸实践，知识才有价值。
author: Anton Chekhov

txt_en: Action is the foundational key to all success.
txt_cn: 行动是所有成功的根本。
author: Pablo Picasso

txt_en: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
txt_cn: 像你明天就会离世那样生活，像你可以永葆青春那样学习。
author: Mahatma Gandhi

txt_en: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
txt_cn: 愚蠢和天赋的区别在于，天赋是有极限的。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant; if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
txt_cn: 不历严冬，春天不迷人；不尝艰辛，成功无欣喜。
author: Anne Bradstreet
